title: Introduction to Wheel Throwing
description: A full-day introduction to throwing on the wheel. Learn to centre clay, pull walls, and create simple bowls and cylinders. All materials included; take home your unfired pieces to collect after firing.

title: Wood-Firing Weekend
description: A two-day intensive covering loading and firing a wood kiln. Experience the full cycle from preparation to unloading. Suitable for those with some throwing experience.

title: Beginners Pottery Day
description: No experience needed. Try hand-building and the wheel in a relaxed session. Make a small piece to take home (fired and glazed; collection or postage arranged separately).

title: Geometric Slip Decoration
description: Learn slip-casting basics and hand-paint geometric designs on porcelain. Create a vase or jar to take home. All materials provided.

title: Hand-Building Contemporary Forms
description: Explore coil, slab, and pinch techniques to build sculptural and functional forms. Focus on clean lines and surface design. No wheel experience required.

title: Six-Week Evening Course
description: Weekly two-hour sessions covering throwing, trimming, glazing, and basic design. Build confidence on the wheel and take home several finished pieces.

title: Botanical Slip Painting
description: Paint botanical motifs in slip on earthenware. Learn brush control, layering, and simple glaze application. Take home a decorated plate or tile.

title: Introduction to Earthenware
description: A gentle introduction to hand-building with earthenware clay. Make a small pot or dish and decorate it with underglaze. Ideal for complete beginners.

title: Wildflower Tiles & Plaques
description: Create earthenware tiles or wall plaques with wildflower designs. Learn slip trailing and brush painting. All levels welcome.

title: Glazing & Finishing
description: Focus on glazing techniques for stoneware: dipping, brushing, and layering. Bring bisque pieces or use provided ones. Covers firing and safety.

title: Saturday Throwing at Stoke Bridge
description: Saturday throwing lessons for beginners and improvers at Stoke Bridge Workshops. Stand-alone sessions or book several to experience the full throwing process. Full details and booking on the Stoke Bridge Workshops site.

title: Saturday Throwing at Stoke Bridge
description: Saturday throwing lessons for beginners and improvers at Stoke Bridge Workshops. Stand-alone or book multiple sessions. Booking via Stoke Bridge Workshops.

title: Raku Firing Session
description: Experience raku firing at the workshop. We had a lot of fun—this is the sort of thing that happens in our raku lesson sessions. Create unique crackle and lustre effects. See the lessons page for details.

title: Throwing & Hand Building at kgreene pottery
description: Lessons in throwing and hand building at Karl's workshop. Tuesday or Thursday sessions. A creative, nurturing space to learn and develop your skills. Various times to suit—see lessons page for availability.
